text: 3.6 Snd 16.27, Mat 12.36-37, 15.11, 15.18-19, Mak 7.15, 7.20, 7.23 Pen yalɨb ak abe mab mɨŋɨlaŋ tek mɨdeb. Mubwak day chɨn ak, tɨmel anɨb ak tek olap sek ma mɨdeb. Yalɨb ak ameb owep chɨnop ak mɨdupsek gɨ tɨmel gup. Pen yalɨb ak mubwak mɨdupsek gek, mubwak ak gach mɨdɨl, tap tɨmel gɨl, pel gɨ dad amɨl, yɨn dad amɨl mubwak mɨdupsek yɨnɨmuŋ tek amub. Mab mɨŋɨlaŋ anɨb ak, mab ke yɨneb mɨgan ak nɨb owup.
